text:
Today I uninstalled @SetuAarogya 
My 4 neighbors are COVID19 positive and there is no alert around. It indicates “Aap Surakshit hain” so if I am safe and sound why do I need an extra burden on my phone with WiFi and Bluetooth always switched On.  Cc @narendramodi
